name: Steady Slice
description:
Deliver as many pizzas as you can before the time runs out. Don't run too fast or you'll drop your pizzas!


Controls:

Arrow keys / WAD -  move

Alt+Enter - Toggle fullscreen mode

Esc - quit

Authors:

Programming - CKana (Sami Ylikulju)

Art - SomeFarang (Jack Pressnell)

Music and sound effects - Neeko Freeman
